column1: Q2 - When considering the below options which are would be most likely to make you stay at your current company?
Please select the level of importance of why you would STAY at your current organization if this were offered for each of the following statements.

column41: Energy & Utilities e.g. oil, electricity, gas
column46: Marketing services e.g. advertising, PR, design

column1: Pay and compensation (e.g., salary, bonus, stock options)
Employee benefits (e.g., healthcare , mental health and wellness services, Paid Time Off, complimentary food and services)
Employer's respect for personal priorities outside of work
Workplace policy (i.e. in office, from home, hybrid)
Social responsibility (e.g., societal justice, community outreach) policies and practices
Use of advanced technologies (e.g., AI, automation)
Visa sponsorship / immigration assistance from an employer
